domain.name: Musician
domain.description: A musician in the world, like Adele or Bob Dylan

text:
@ByronWoodson @janellekz @conways_law Reminds me of the Fiona Apple line: He said, “It’s all in your head.” I said, “So’s everything but he didn’t get it.” (State change = adaptation.)

Okay. Let’s see how it goes over time. Would be interested in seeing how this group of humanity adapts to that.
